actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Appropriations.

official_title: A resolution to express the sense of the Senate that the committee on Appropriations should make the full appropriations authorized for carrying out programs for assessment and mitigation of radon under the Toxic Substances Control Act.
subjects: Federal aid to air pollution control

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Senate that the Committee on Appropriations should: (1) make the full appropriation authorized for FY 1990 for grants to States for assessment and mitigation of radon under the Toxic Substances Control Act; and (2) appropriate $1,500,000 for the Environmental Protection Agency to carry out a study under such Act to determine the extent of radon contamination in school buildings.

titles.title: A resolution to express the sense of the Senate that the committee on Appropriations should make the full appropriations authorized for carrying out programs for assessment and mitigation of radon under the Toxic Substances Control Act.
